name: $resourceType
desc: Returns the FHIR type name for this instance

name: $identifier
desc: Returns: Identifier of this Invoice, often used for reference in correspondence about this invoice or for tracking of payments.

name: $addidentifier
desc: Identifier of this Invoice, often used for reference in correspondence about this invoice or for tracking of payments.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Identifier of this Invoice, often used for reference in correspondence about this invoice or for tracking of payments.

name: $status
desc: Returns: The current state of the Invoice.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The current state of the Invoice.

name: $cancelledReason
desc: Returns: In case of Invoice cancellation a reason must be given (entered in error, superseded by corrected invoice etc.).

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: In case of Invoice cancellation a reason must be given (entered in error, superseded by corrected invoice etc.).

name: $::type
desc: Returns: Type of Invoice depending on domain, realm an usage (e.g. internal/external, dental, preliminary).

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Type of Invoice depending on domain, realm an usage (e.g. internal/external, dental, preliminary).

name: $subject
desc: Returns: The individual or set of individuals receiving the goods and services billed in this invoice.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The individual or set of individuals receiving the goods and services billed in this invoice.

name: $recipient
desc: Returns: The individual or Organization responsible for balancing of this invoice.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The individual or Organization responsible for balancing of this invoice.

name: $date
desc: Returns: Date/time(s) of when this Invoice was posted.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Date/time(s) of when this Invoice was posted.

name: $participant
desc: Returns: Indicates who or what performed or participated in the charged service.

name: $addparticipant
desc: Indicates who or what performed or participated in the charged service.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Indicates who or what performed or participated in the charged service.

name: $issuer
desc: Returns: The organizationissuing the Invoice.

name: $account
desc: Returns: Account which is supposed to be balanced with this Invoice.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Account which is supposed to be balanced with this Invoice.

name: $lineItem
desc: Returns: Each line item represents one charge for goods and services rendered. Details such as date, code and amount are found in the referenced ChargeItem resource.

name: $addlineItem
desc: Each line item represents one charge for goods and services rendered. Details such as date, code and amount are found in the referenced ChargeItem resource.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Each line item represents one charge for goods and services rendered. Details such as date, code and amount are found in the referenced ChargeItem resource.

name: $totalNet
desc: Returns: Invoice total , taxes excluded.

name: $totalGross
desc: Returns: Invoice total, tax included.

name: $paymentTerms
desc: Returns: Payment details such as banking details, period of payment, deductibles, methods of payment.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Payment details such as banking details, period of payment, deductibles, methods of payment.

name: $note
desc: Returns: Comments made about the invoice by the issuer, subject, or other participants.

name: $addnote
desc: Comments made about the invoice by the issuer, subject, or other participants.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Comments made about the invoice by the issuer, subject, or other participants.
